author: craigmcc
msg: Correctly expire version zero cookies by setting a time far in the past.

author: craigmcc
msg: When "redirecting" to the error page in handlePageException(), first try to
forward to the error page.  If this fails because the response has already
been committed, do an include of the error page instead -- that way the user
gets at least some feedback on what is causing the problem.

author: craigmcc
msg: Open standard output and standard error for appending, rather than overwriting

author: nacho
msg: Porting patches made to Tomcat 3.2 into the main branch

msg: Porting patches made to Tomcat 3.2 into the main branch
